personalInfo.education: University of North Carolina-Charlotte (2008, Managerial Leadership)

tourBios.carHigh: Played the Nordea Tour (2008-2009), winning the PGA Laudmann Open in 2008 and Telmar Open in 2009..Also played the European Challenge Tour from 2009-2011 and the eGolf Tour in 2011-2013...Has played in one Web.com Tour event, the 2011 Chitimacha Louisiana Open (T48).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was member of Swedish national golf team...Was 2008 All-American, 2008 Palmer Cup team member and a 2006-2008 Academic All-American while attending the University of North Carolina-Charlotte.
tourBios.personal: Is an only child...Attended Tibble Gymnasium...Non-golf jobs include leadership consultant for 10L Tool...Favorite early golf memory was holing a 4-iron from 150 yards for eagle while playing with his dad at age 11...If not a professional golfer, would be an entrepreneur...Biggest thrill outside golf is downhill skiing...Favorite golf courses he has played include Barseback G&CC, Castle Stuart and New South Wales GL...Would like to play Pebble Beach and Augusta National...Favorite teams are UNC-Charlotte 49ers and the Carolina Panthers...Favorite TV shows are "Homeland," "The Big Bang Theory" and "Game of Thrones."...Favorite movies are "Ace Ventura: Pet Detective" and those from the Bourne trilogy...Favorite entertainers are Bruno Mars and Phillip Phillips...Favorite books are The Da Vinci Code and anything in the Jack Reacher series...Favorite athlete is Roger Federer...Favorite cities are Stockholm, Sweden, Kauai, Hawaii, and Verbier in the Swiss Alps...Dream foursome would include Ingemar Stenmark and Robin Williams...Likes to dance...Bucket list includes winning the Masters, seeing a blue whale and watching a wild tiger...Twitter name is @jonaseh.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T48th in 2011 at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open.
